useCase.name: User running ReWOOAgent to determine final result

mainSequence.step: User runs ReWOOAgent by providing input
ReWOOAgent reasons about the action with ReasonLLM
ReWOOAgent simulates the world using WorldLLM
ReWOOAgent observes the effects with ObserveLLM
ReWOOAgent determines the outcome using OutcomeLLM
ReWOOAgent returns final result to User
